Text: HEOF QuestionI have two requests that I hope you can help me with First I wanted to see if there was an executed document removing Intrust If there is I would like to get a copy of that Also you mentioned a side letter agreement drawn up to allow the GPs to have the right to remove Intrust I would also like to get a copy of that document Let me know if you have any questions Thanks Russ
